about_the_game:
Kirusza, the dark magician, has been trying to collect the magic crystals for centuries. Indescribable power is all, Kirusza strives for, no matter, the cost. Disguised as an ordinary ice cream shop, the wizard Skovhir was able to hide the crystals. After Skovhir's death, you were chosen to continue his task. As an apprentice, you have been given a lot of responsibility. Are you able to fulfil this task and stop Kirusza?

Make magical ice cream

Grow and harvest magical plants to craft various types of ice cream. Each type of ice cream does a different amount of damage to different enemies.

Defend yourself

You can defend yourself against Kirusza and the Semacios, using the magical ice cream flavours and your weapon. Stop them in time, before they destroy the ice cream parlour and get to the magic crystals.

name: Scoop 'n Shoot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR: Roomfilling VR, 2x2m Play Area
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i7
  • Graphics: GTX 980 or higher
  • VR Support: OpenXR: Valve Index HMD, Valve Index Controller, 4x4m Play Area

short_description: Scoop'n Shoot is a VR first person shooter. Create magical ice cream flavours, grow various extraordinary plants and destroy the mighty magician Kirusza.
